name: Vacuum Shooter
description:
The robots from the secret underground lab want to dispose of Shoomba, the old vacuum cleaner robot. Help Shoomba escape from the lab! Albeit it can’t shoot his enemies, it can vacuum their bullets and throw them back!

Use WASD or Arrows to move, your mouse to aim, and hold left-click to vacuum enemy bullets or keys, and release to throw them back. Explore a non-linear dungeon, open locked doors and find two life upgrades before reaching the exit.

Due to time limits of the GMTK Jam 2018, keys are bugged and some doors are open even though they should not. We're sorry for the inconvenience!
